Question: What relationships exist between the characters in *Yuvvraaj*?
Options:
A. Danny Yuvvraaj Singh is an estranged brother of Deven Yuvvraaj Singh.
B. Deven Yuvvraaj Singh dislikes Dr. P. K. Banton because he is not wealthy.
C. Dr. P. K. Banton is related to both Danny and Deven Yuvvraaj Singh.
D. Danny Yuvvraaj Singh and Deven Yuvvraaj Singh meet after 12 years.
Answer: a) Danny Yuvvraaj Singh is an estranged brother of Deven Yuvvraaj Singh. and d) Danny Yuvvraaj Singh and Deven Yuvvraaj Singh meet after 12 years.

Question: What is true about the relationship between Danny Yuvvraaj Singh, Deven Yuvvraaj Singh, and their deceased father in the movie 'Yuvvraaj'?
Options:
A. Danny and Deven are estranged brothers who reunite after 12 years.
B. Their deceased father played a role in the brothers' estrangement.
C. Danny was disowned by their father due to a fight with Deven.
D. All of the above

Question: What is true about the relationship between Danny and Deven Yuvvraaj Singh in the movie *Yuvvraaj*?
Options:
A. They are estranged brothers who reunite after 12 years.
B. Danny signed an agreement to become a billionaire in 40 days.
C. Deven is also involved in the quest to become a billionaire.
D. All of the above

Question: What actions did Danny Yuvvraaj Singh take regarding his family in the movie 'Yuvvraaj'?
Options:
A. a) He scammed his brother out of his money
B. b) He inherited everything from their deceased father
C. c) He left everything to the mentally challenged Gyanesh
D. d) He tried to support Gyanesh financially
Answer: a) He scammed his brother out of his money, c) He left everything to the mentally challenged Gyanesh

Question: Which of the following statements is true regarding Anushka, Gyanesh Kumar Yuvvraaj Singh, and his deceased father in the context of the movie *Yuvvraaj*?
Options:
A. a) Anushka allowed Gyanesh Kumar Yuvvraaj Singh into her orchestra.
B. b) Gyanesh Kumar Yuvvraaj Singh inherited everything from his deceased father.
C. c) Gyanesh Kumar Yuvvraaj Singh was mentally challenged.
D. d) Anushka is a prominent character in the movie.
Answer: a) Anushka allowed Gyanesh Kumar Yuvvraaj Singh into her orchestra.
